name: Bugs And Glitches
description:
This game was made for the Ludum Dare 46 compo in 2 days.

YOU NEED TO KEEP YOUR GAME SAFE FROM THOSE BUGS AND GLITCHES.

Artwork - Me

Gameplay - Me

Design - Me

Music  - Me 

Your job as the player is to keep the core of the game safe from those pesky bugs and glitches. Will you be able to pass all those levels without those bugs ruining your game??

The arrow buttons on the menu  are used to change the difficulty settings.
